title: LuckyKey
author: LuckyKey
content: Hello all,I have a satori roll for sale, sealed, post fork. If anyone is interested please send me your questions / offers. Can use minerjones for escrow. Thanks

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Do you have a picture of the roll/chips?

comments.author: LuckyKey
comments.body: https://imgur.com/a/n4MmMWcSorry for the link and not pic, was having difficulty inserting so pic would be visible in post

comments.author: LuckyKey
comments.body: Quote from: Primo-bit on August 22, 2023, 01:56:24 PMThank you

comments.author: tread93
comments.body: Quote from: Primo-bit on August 22, 2023, 01:56:24 PMIn all of its glory! Beautiful roll m8. I would love to get it but unfortunately it's out of my price range rn

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: what is your target price? I apologize if you have it above and I missed it.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Nice casing you have the roll wrapped in....care to share where you acquired the storage cylinder roll?   Also anyone know what the recent pre fork and post fork Satori rolls are going for?

comments.author: Lesbian Cow
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on August 25, 2023, 09:09:54 AM  Nice casing you have the roll wrapped in....care to share where you acquired the storage cylinder roll?   Also anyone know what the recent pre fork and post fork Satori rolls are going for? That looks like an airtite coin holder tube.https://air-tites.com/collections/air-tite-coin-holder-tubes

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: Lesbian Cow on August 25, 2023, 10:03:27 AMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on August 25, 2023, 09:09:54 AM  Nice casing you have the roll wrapped in....care to share where you acquired the storage cylinder roll?   Also anyone know what the recent pre fork and post fork Satori rolls are going for? That looks like an airtite coin holder tube.https://air-tites.com/collections/air-tite-coin-holder-tubes   Thanks Lesbo for the link and information....will look into and see if I should acquire a few of these someday for my Satori Rolls.   Its a good way to protect the fragile ones they come in!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on August 27, 2023, 12:49:30 AMQuote from: Lesbian Cow on August 25, 2023, 10:03:27 AMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on August 25, 2023, 09:09:54 AM  Nice casing you have the roll wrapped in....care to share where you acquired the storage cylinder roll?   Also anyone know what the recent pre fork and post fork Satori rolls are going for? That looks like an airtite coin holder tube.https://air-tites.com/collections/air-tite-coin-holder-tubes   Thanks Lesbo for the link and information....will look into and see if I should acquire a few of these someday for my Satori Rolls.   Its a good way to protect the fragile ones they come in!if you give me the size of the satori roll - I can always check against the airtite tubes I have and then send them to you or give to mj to send to you.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on August 27, 2023, 01:04:09 AMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on August 27, 2023, 12:49:30 AMQuote from: Lesbian Cow on August 25, 2023, 10:03:27 AMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on August 25, 2023, 09:09:54 AM  Nice casing you have the roll wrapped in....care to share where you acquired the storage cylinder roll?   Also anyone know what the recent pre fork and post fork Satori rolls are going for? That looks like an airtite coin holder tube.https://air-tites.com/collections/air-tite-coin-holder-tubes   Thanks Lesbo for the link and information....will look into and see if I should acquire a few of these someday for my Satori Rolls.   Its a good way to protect the fragile ones they come in!if you give me the size of the satori roll - I can always check against the airtite tubes I have and then send them to you or give to mj to send to you.    Thanks for the offer...I will be thinking about these....once if I ever get my rolls out from underground someday will consider it.     They would be a good way to place since the Satori rolls casings are so brittle.

comments.author: LuckyKey
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on August 24, 2023, 02:38:58 AMwhat is your target price? I apologize if you have it above and I missed it. Around 0.1 BTC. I have a cash offer pending at around that, slightly more.

comments.author: LuckyKey
comments.body: Quote from: LuckyKey on August 27, 2023, 03:35:08 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on August 24, 2023, 02:38:58 AMwhat is your target price? I apologize if you have it above and I missed it. Around 0.1 BTC. I have a cash offer pending at around that, slightly more.Cash offer didn't happen, still looking for 0.1 BTC for the roll. Can use miner jones for escrow.

comments.author: LuckyKey
comments.body: Quote from: LuckyKey on September 01, 2023, 01:35:48 PMQuote from: LuckyKey on August 27, 2023, 03:35:08 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on August 24, 2023, 02:38:58 AMwhat is your target price? I apologize if you have it above and I missed it. Around 0.1 BTC. I have a cash offer pending at around that, slightly more.Cash offer didn't happen, still looking for 0.1 BTC for the roll. Can use miner jones for escrow.Still available, will accept offer in the 0.09 - 0.095 range.

comments.author: buckrogers
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on August 27, 2023, 12:39:45 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on August 27, 2023, 01:04:09 AMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on August 27, 2023, 12:49:30 AMQuote from: Lesbian Cow on August 25, 2023, 10:03:27 AMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on August 25, 2023, 09:09:54 AM  Nice casing you have the roll wrapped in....care to share where you acquired the storage cylinder roll?   Also anyone know what the recent pre fork and post fork Satori rolls are going for? That looks like an airtite coin holder tube.https://air-tites.com/collections/air-tite-coin-holder-tubes   Thanks Lesbo for the link and information....will look into and see if I should acquire a few of these someday for my Satori Rolls.   Its a good way to protect the fragile ones they come in!if you give me the size of the satori roll - I can always check against the airtite tubes I have and then send them to you or give to mj to send to you.    Thanks for the offer...I will be thinking about these....once if I ever get my rolls out from underground someday will consider it.     They would be a good way to place since the Satori rolls casings are so brittle.Yea, I keep all the rolls in those red top airtite tubes, very nice easy fit.You can pick them up from "OnFireGuy" on Amazon, eBay etc.Details / Specs:Red Capsule Storage Tube for Air-Tite Tubes Hold: 33mm - 42mm Black or White Ring Air-Tite CapsulesMeasurements: 2.035" W x 4.75" H x 51.6mm DiameterEach tube holds 20 Air-Tite Brand Coin CapsulesDesigned to hold Genuine Air-Tite Holders Brand CapsulesLids have a small hole to allow air out of the tubeThe ones I’m seeing on different sites have the red top inside the tube, but you can still buy the ones where the top goes on the outside of the tube which is what I personally prefer, as shown in the pic from the OP above.Thanks!

comments.author: goldlyre
comments.body: How many pieces are there in your roll?

comments.author: hoopstagaloop
comments.body: Quote from: goldlyre on October 15, 2023, 01:08:48 PMHow many pieces are there in your roll?i think it's 25coins or 24, not so sure

comments.author: geophphreigh
comments.body: Quote from: hoopstagaloop on October 15, 2023, 01:41:47 PMQuote from: goldlyre on October 15, 2023, 01:08:48 PMHow many pieces are there in your roll?i think it's 25coins or 24, not so sureFull roll is 25 chips.Each chip has 0.001BTC loaded under the reverse hologram. Therefore a full roll has 0.025BTCA total of 50,500 were produced, numbers 000001-030500 are “pre fork” and 030501-050500 are “post fork”. Geo
